page.title: 11Eating Habits Change.
page.content: We did some research into people's {eating habits}when we visited our local super market and made several interesting discoveries. The{best selling products}are Heinz Baked Beans and Coca Cola, but in spite of advertising campaigns to sell different breakfast cereals, Kellog's Cornflakes are still the favourites. The{biggest change}in food buying has come about because people are becoming very{health conscious.}There is a boom in the purchase of{natural,}nutritious {food.}Less fat, sugar, salt are being sold and food containing{fibres}such as wholemeal{brown bread}are increas- ingly being bought. Tesco Stores have difficulty keeping up with the demand for their booklets "A Tesco Guide to Healthy Eating". We really enjoyed our visit to this supermarket.
